data.sentence: The word هُوَ comes from the root ه و and is associated with the meanings: huwa = He (pronoun. masculine 3rd. sing.)

data.meanings: ate/taste/swallowed, to flavour/savour, appetite/desire, to feed/supply, way of eating, food/meal, cultivate, ripened fruit, an approvable quality in a man (e.g. intelligence/prudence/discretion), good state/condition in respect of food, one who feeds much, place of eating.
data.sentence: The word يُطْعِمُنِي comes from the root ط ع م and is associated with the meanings: ate/taste/swallowed, to flavour/savour, appetite/desire, to feed/supply, way of eating, food/meal, cultivate, ripened fruit, an approvable quality in a man (e.g. intelligence/prudence/discretion), good state/condition in respect of food, one who feeds much, place of eating.

data.meanings: to water, give/ask to drink, irrigate. siqayatun - drinking cup.
data.sentence: The word وَيَسْقِينِ comes from the root س ق ي and is associated with the meanings: to water, give/ask to drink, irrigate. siqayatun - drinking cup.
